X-TIKA:content:
YOUR URGENT RESPONSE IS NEEDED.

		FROM DR.CHARLES JIDEOFOR
NNPC TOWERS IKOYI
LAGOS-NIGERIA


  Hello,


  Good day,


 I am the Chairman of the Contract Award Committee, Federal
Ministry of Petroleum Resources, Nigeria I am in search of
an agent to assist us in the transfer of (US$30,4M) THIRTY
MILLION, FOUR HUNDRED THOUSAND UNITED STATES DOLLARS.($USD
30,400,000) And subsequent investment in properties in your
country.You will be required to


 (1) Assist in the transfer of the said sum
 (2) Advise on lucrative areas for investment
 (3) Assist us in purchase of properties.


If you decide to render your service to us in this regard,
20% of the total sum will be offerred to you. Pls, quickly
get back to me.


thanks


Respectfully.


DR.CHARLES JIDEOFOR


Chairman Contract Award Committee {CCAC}
